channel.title: Comments on: Less QQ More Pew Pew

item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description:
yeah, I think the hogger one was my favorite, followed by the random gnome player who got buffed to raid boss status.
I bet whoever that was had a blast
item.content:encoded:
yeah, I think the hogger one was my favorite, followed by the random gnome player who got buffed to raid boss status.

I bet whoever that was had a blast

item.title: By: Bored-at-work
item.dc:creator: Bored-at-work
item.content:encoded:
Did someone mention Pew Pew?…

Foton at afkgamer.com lists some pictures about end of beta goodness in WoW:TBC beta
Blizzard minion Tseric took some time from his busy schedule to visit Darnassus and Stormwind on the Warcraft beta server: Dark Overlord Tseric destroys Stormwind!…

item.title: By: Foton
item.dc:creator: Foton
item.description: Links work, Dreaming. Can't do an img tag in comments, but full URL to image file is good enough for voyeurs like us.
item.content:encoded: Links work, Dreaming. Can’t do an img tag in comments, but full URL to image file is good enough for voyeurs like us.

item.title: By: Dreaming
item.dc:creator: Dreaming
item.description:
I wasn't thinking enough to take screenshots, but one of my guildmates did.
I think the murlock attack was my favorite. I'd link pics but I'm not sure if links work on here and we can't edit our comments.
item.content:encoded:
I wasn’t thinking enough to take screenshots, but one of my guildmates did.

I think the murlock attack was my favorite. I’d link pics but I’m not sure if links work on here and we can’t edit our comments.

item.content:encoded: Awesome roXet! That would have been so much fun to see.

item.content:encoded: Lucky! I would’ve liked to see that.

item.title: By: roXet
item.dc:creator: roXet
item.description: Haha, last night on the beta was great. Als0, the guild you see Tseric in is my beta guild, Less QQ More Pew Pew. We were sitting outside Ironforge and I noticed that Eyonix was in a player guild, yet Tseric wasn't. So I fired him a guild invite and he accepted. He ended up turning into Baron Rivendare and porting us to Orgimmar where he started spawning Fel Reavers. The horde barely even noticed us standing on top of their bank. =)
item.content:encoded: Haha, last night on the beta was great. Als0, the guild you see Tseric in is my beta guild, Less QQ More Pew Pew. We were sitting outside Ironforge and I noticed that Eyonix was in a player guild, yet Tseric wasn’t. So I fired him a guild invite and he accepted. He ended up turning into Baron Rivendare and porting us to Orgimmar where he started spawning Fel Reavers. The horde barely even noticed us standing on top of their bank. =)
